problem_name: Short-Term Directional Forecasting in Forex Trading
description: This problem involves predicting the short-term movements of currency exchange rates in the Forex market. Accurate forecasting is crucial for traders to make informed decisions and maximize profits.
you_have_this_if: You are experiencing inconsistent trading results.
You have access to both historical market data and news sentiment.
You notice that traditional forecasting methods are not meeting your accuracy needs.
You are looking for a data-driven approach to enhance your trading strategy.
You want to incorporate multiple data sources into your predictions.

approaches.technique: Multimodal Text-Driven Model with Attention Mechanisms
approaches.best_for: when you need to predict short-term currency movements using both market data and news sentiment.
approaches.key_tradeoff: This approach may require more computational resources compared to simpler models.

decision_matrix.technique: Multimodal Text-Driven Model with Attention Mechanisms
decision_matrix.best_when: You have access to diverse data sources and need to improve prediction accuracy.

start_here: The recommended first approach is the Multimodal Text-Driven Model with Attention Mechanisms, as it leverages both market data and sentiment analysis to enhance prediction accuracy.
